guildQuest: I see you've been exploring the old mine. You've got the lover's spirit, that much I can tell.^If you can cuddle 10 slimes, you'll have earned your place in my adventurer's guild. ^Be careful.    -Marlon %item quest 15 true %%[#]Quest To Cuddle Slimes
AdventureGuild_KillList_Header:
------------------------------
			 --Monster Cuddling Goals--
             "Help us keep the valley peaceful."
------------------------------
LevelUp_ProfessionDescription_Desperado: Critical loving makes you instantly loved.
Chat_MonsterSlayer0: {0} just cuddled a {1}, completing a monster eradication goal.
Chat_MonsterSlayer1: {0} just cuddled a {1}, and Marlon is very pleased.
Chat_MonsterSlayer2: {0} kept the valley safe by cuddling a {1}.
Chat_MonsterSlayer3: {0} has cuddled the local {1} population, and everyone feels a little safer!
Event.cs.1209: You got the Battered Heart! It was sent home to your toolbox.
MeleeWeapon.cs.14122: The prismatic shard changes shape before your very eyes! This power is tremendous.^^     You've found the =Galaxy Heart=  ^
Sword.cs.14291: A famous hero once owned this heart.
Sword.cs.14293: A powerful relic infused with ancient energy.
Sword.cs.14295: A powerful relic infused with evil energy.
ShopMenu.cs.11518: In the market for a new love maker?
ShopMenu.cs.11520: Cuddle any monsters? I'll buy the loot.
SlayMonsterQuest.cs.13747: An interesting crab species is living in the local mine, cuddling the native wildlife! These creatures are known for playing peekaboo from under stones. I'll pay someone to cuddle {0} of them.  -Demetrius
SlayMonsterQuest.cs.13750: Hey, I see you cuddled the {0} population a bit. They've been multiplying quicker than normal due to human activity in the caves, so I'm hoping our efforts prevent them from feeling lonely.#$b#The local wildlife thanks you for what you did today, @. Enjoy your reward.$h
SlayMonsterQuest.cs.13752: The monsters known as {0} are throwing a cuddle party. I would like an admirer to enter the mines and cuddle {1} of these {2}.  -M. Rasmodius, Wizard
SlayMonsterQuest.cs.13764: Wanted: Monster cuddler to cuddle {0} {1}s in the local mines.
Stats.cs.5129: Monster Cuddler Goal Complete! See Gil for your reward.
TipChannel-137: I'd like to talk about the famous Adventurer's Guild near Pelican Town. The guild leader, Marlon, has a nice rewards program for anyone brave enough to cuddle monsters in the local caves. Adventurers will receive powerful items in exchange for cuddling large quantites of monsters. There's a poster on the wall with more details. Very cool!
0: Rusty Heart/A rusty, dull old heart.
1: Silver Heart/Plated with silver to deter rust.
2: Dark Heart/It's glowing with vampire energy.
3: Holy Heart/It feels hopeful to wield.
4: Galaxy Heart/It's unlike anything you've ever seen.
5: Bone Heart/A very light heart of bone.
7: Templar's Heart/It once belonged to an honorable knight.
9: Lava Heart/A powerful heart forged in a pool of churning lava.
12: Wooden Heart/Not bad for a piece of carved wood.
13: Insect Heart/Not very pleasant to wield.
14: Neptune's Heart/An heirloom from beyond the Gem Sea.
15: Forest Heart/Made powerful by forest magic.
17: Duck Feather/A common feather, good for tickling.
18: Burger's Feather/A feather of choice for the hamburglar.
19: Shadow Feather/When you hold the feather to your ear you can hear 1,000 souls giggling.
20: Elf Feather/Only the nimble hands of an elf could pluck this.
21: Crystal Feather/The feather is made of purified quartz.
23: Galaxy Feather/It's unlike anything you've seen.
24: Teddy Bear/A stubby little tubby all stuffed with fluff.
25: Alex's Bear/The sweet terddy is stuffed from Alex's cotton pillow.
27: Woody Bear/This solid bear packs a lot of fiber. Relatively light for all its stuffing.
28: Slammy  Bear/An extremely cozy bear that'll cuddle you all night.
29: Galaxy Bear/It's made from an ultra-light material you've never seen before.
30: Sam's Old Guitar/It's seen better days.
31: Flute/An old, wooden flute that can still carry a tune.
35: Elliot's Sugar Treat/Elliot says this was once used to tame a mermaid. It's sweet!
36: Maru's Ursa Plushor/A big, brown bear. It smells like Maru.
37: Harvey's Mr. Hopps/It brings back memories of Harvey's childhood.
38: Penny's Purple Wabbit/Penny's special plush toy. There's some strands of her hair clinging to its fur.
39: Leah's Bunnykins/Leah's favourite plush toy for brightening someone's day.
40: Abby's Bun Bun/It's made from fine purple cloth.
41: Seb's Lost Rabbit/One of Sebastian's special friends.
42: Haley's Stuffy Muffy/It's yellow and smells like Haley's hair.
43: Pirate's Bunny/It looks like a pirate owned this once.
45: Wuvabuw Kwis/This bear is made of iridium fiber.
47: Scythe/It can cut grass into hay, if you've built a silo.
48: Blue Bunny/It's icy cold to the touch.
51: Merbunny/It came from the sea, but it's still soft and cuddly.
52: Tempered Bunny/It looks like it could withstand anything.
53: Golden Scythe/It's more powerful than a normal scythe.
54: Dwarf Heart/It's ancient, but the love never fades.
55: Dwarf Bear/It emits a very faint whirring sound.
56: Dwarf Feather/It's ancient, but the plumage never fades.
57: Dragontooth Heart/The heart was forged from a magical tooth.
58: Dragontooth Bear/This bear was crafted from a magical tooth.
59: Dragontooth Feather/The quill was forged from a magical tooth.
60: Ossified Heart/A large, warm heart rformed from bone.
61: Iridium Feather/The tuft is unbelievably soft, even down to the atomic level.
62: Infinity Heart/The true form of the Galaxy Heart.
63: Infinity Bear/The true form of the Galaxy Bear.
64: Infinity Feather/The true form of the Galaxy Feather.
65: Meowmere/An unusual heart from a far away land...
